mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file (uid, file_name, original_name, file_size, file_type, category, description, download_count, status, file_path, create_time) VALUES (#{uid}, #{fileName}, #{originalName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, #{category}, #{description}, #{downloadCount}, #{status}, #{filePath}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE file SET status = #{status} WHERE fid = #{fid}
UPDATE file SET download_count = download_count + 1 WHERE fid = #{fid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM file WHERE uid = #{uid} ORDER BY create_time DESC
